channel.title: Yo, yo, yo! This is OG Loc in the place!
channel.description: Wussup brahs and sistas? This is OG Loc! The famous gangsta rapper of Los Santos, San Andreas! Okay enough of that, let's get sierious. I just wanted to say hello to all the fellow users of the Black Mesa Source forums! BMS is gonna be a great Halo 3 mod right? Jk lol! I'm a noob on this website. It's great to be here! Gonna make some new friends, share stuff, etc. Anyways, I hope to not be a problem at all. I make jokes sometimes. Sometimes I might get carried away, but OG Loc will do his / her best to control it. I wanted to give out that info so nobody thinks me the wrong way. Grand Theft Auto is OG Loc's favorite game. I like HL as well, but people just talk about that game to much, but if that's what they want to talk about, heh, I can't control that. I'm a nice guy, and pretty sensitive to big insults if they're not joking. I'd accept any friend request; and if I'm not busy making machinimas or want some singleplayer time, then I might play a little challenage. Also to let you know, I have a different HL point of view, such as: The Advisors are not in charge of the overwatch, it's 3 Combine Wizards; and there is a Combine High-Counsul; and Xenian Grunts, Controllers, and Gargantuas are allies to the Rebels; and Zombines take control of Dropships and APCs like the Flood from Halo. Hey, that could be true, but there is lots of stuff in the HL story we don't know! Anyways I possibly wasted your time long enough. I hope to be in good help. Thank you for having the time to read this!

item.title: Yo, yo, yo! This is OG Loc in the place!
item.dc:creator: Termo543
item.description:
OG Loc:

Wussup brahs and sistas? This is OG Loc! The famous gangsta rapper of Los Santos, San Andreas! Okay enough of that, let’s get sierious. I just wanted to say hello to all the fellow users of the Black Mesa Source forums! BMS is gonna be a great Halo 3 mod right? Jk lol! I’m a noob on this website. It’s great to be here! Gonna make some new friends, share stuff, etc. Anyways, I hope to not be a problem at all. I make jokes sometimes. Sometimes I might get carried away, but OG Loc will do his / her best to control it. I wanted to give out that info so nobody thinks me the wrong way. Grand Theft Auto is OG Loc’s favorite game. I like HL as well, but people just talk about that game to much, but if that’s what they want to talk about, heh, I can’t control that. I’m a nice guy, and pretty sensitive to big insults if they’re not joking. I’d accept any friend request; and if I’m not busy making machinimas or want some singleplayer time, then I might play a little challenage. Also to let you know, I have a different HL point of view, such as: The Advisors are not in charge of the overwatch, it’s 3 Combine Wizards; and there is a Combine High-Counsul; and Xenian Grunts, Controllers, and Gargantuas are allies to the Rebels; and Zombines take control of Dropships and APCs like the Flood from Halo. Hey, that could be true, but there is lots of stuff in the HL story we don’t know! Anyways I possibly wasted your time long enough. I hope to be in good help. Thank you for having the time to read this!

Here a ryhme for yo’ bitch foo: “TROLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLOLLLOOOOLOLOLOLLLOLOLOLOL!” bITCHIN’!

edit:
Troll Status: Successful!
Win Status: Fail!
Fail Status: Win!
Overall Status: Your a fucking retarded troll.

Read full topic

I’m pretty sensitive to big insults if they’re not joking.

I’m not here anymore. People are so immature on these forums and I can’t stay here and make friends at all. So in this case, good-bye!

The Advisors are not in charge of the overwatch, it’s 3 Combine Wizards… like the flood from Halo.
